title: Eddie Gleadall
text:
Edward Gleadall (died 1993, in <a href="Sheffield">Sheffield</a>) was an English professional <a href="association%20football">football</a> winger. He played in the <a href="Football%20League">Football League</a> for <a href="Bury%20F.C.">Bury</a> and <a href="Scunthorpe%20United%20F.C.">Scunthorpe & Lindsay United</a>.
Gleadall joined <a href="Bury%20F.C.">Bury</a>, making his debut in the 1951–52 season. He left in March 1957, joining <a href="Scunthorpe%20United%20F.C.">Scunthorpe & Lindsay United</a>.
On leaving Scunthorpe he joined <a href="Weymouth%20F.C.">Weymouth</a>. He joined <a href="Mossley%20A.F.C.">Mossley</a> in 1959, leaving at the end the 1959–50 season.
